languages.text: "На аренах правят ведьмы — так заведено на шпилях. Смертоносные убийцы, невесты наших мертвых божеств. Когда они выходят на арену, толпа бьется в экстазе — но такое случается нечасто. В основном мясным делом занимаются их выкормыши, Кровавые прозелиты. Лучшие убийцы и атлеты, служащие культу... Зазнавшиеся выскочки. Они слишком давно не терпели поражений".

traits.locale_text: "На аренах правят ведьмы — так заведено на шпилях. Смертоносные убийцы, невесты наших мертвых божеств. Когда они выходят на арену, толпа бьется в экстазе — но такое случается нечасто. В основном мясным делом занимаются их выкормыши, Кровавые прозелиты. Лучшие убийцы и атлеты, служащие культу... Зазнавшиеся выскочки. Они слишком давно не терпели поражений".
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Wyches rule the arenas — this is the way of the spires. They are lethal, brides of our dead gods. When they enter the arena, the crowd writhes with ecstasy, but this is a rare sight. Typically, their fosterlings, the Bloodstained Proselytes, oversee the butchery. These are the best killers and athletes who serve the Cult... Such arrogant upstarts. They have been undefeated for far too long."
languages.original_text: "На аренах правят ведьмы — так заведено на шпилях. Смертоносные убийцы, невесты наших мертвых божеств. Когда они выходят на арену, толпа бьется в экстазе — но такое случается нечасто. В основном мясным делом занимаются их выкормыши, Кровавые прозелиты. Лучшие убийцы и атлеты, служащие культу... Зазнавшиеся выскочки. Они слишком давно не терпели поражений".

traits.locale_text: "Wyches rule the arenas — that is the way of the spires. They are lethal. They are the brides of our dead gods. When they walk the arena, the crowd thrashes in ecstasy — but it is a rare sight. Typically it's their fosterlings, the Bloodstained Proselytes, who take care of the butchery. The best killers and athletes who serve the Cult... Conceited upstarts. It has been too long since their last defeat."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: "Wyches rule the arenas — that is the way of the spires. They are lethal. They are the brides of our dead gods. When they enter the arena, the crowd writhes with ecstasy, but this is a rare sight. Typically, their fosterlings, the Bloodstained Proselytes, oversee the butchery. These are the best killers and athletes who serve the Cult... Such arrogant upstarts. They have been undefeated for far too long."

languages.text: « Les Cérastes règnent sur l'arène. C'est ainsi que fonctionnent les tours. Parmi eux se trouvent les redoutables épouses de nos dieux éteints. En de rares occasions, elles descendent dans l'arène et plongent les foules dans l'extase. Généralement, ce sont leurs protégés, les Prosélytes sanglants, qui participent à ces boucheries. Ce sont les meilleurs athlètes et assassins au service du Culte... De sales petits arrivistes. Cela fait trop longtemps qu'ils n'ont pas essuyé une défaite. »
languages.original_text: "Wyches rule the arenas — this is the way of the spires. They are lethal, brides of our dead gods. When they enter the arena, the crowd writhes with ecstasy, but this is a rare sight. Typically, their fosterlings, the Bloodstained Proselytes, oversee the butchery. These are the best killers and athletes who serve the Cult... Such arrogant upstarts. They have been undefeated for far too long."

traits.locale_text: « Les Cérastes règnent sur l'arène. C'est ainsi que fonctionnent les tours. Parmi eux se trouvent les redoutables épouses de nos dieux éteints. En de rares occasions, elles descendent dans l'arène et plongent les foules dans l'extase. Généralement, ce sont leurs protégés, les Prosélytes Entachés de sang, qui participent à ces boucheries. Ce sont les meilleurs athlètes et assassins au service du Culte... De sales petits arrivistes. Cela fait trop longtemps qu'ils n'ont pas essuyé une défaite. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: “巫灵教派负责管理竞技场，这就是尖塔的规矩。她们是致命的监督者，是死亡众神的新娘。每当她们进入竞技场时，所有观众都会欣喜若狂，但这样的场面并不多见。通常情况下，监督屠宰的工作都是由她们的养子‘血腥叛党’来做。他们是最出色的杀手与角斗者，为巫灵教派服务……这群新人实在是太傲慢了，他们已经太久没栽过跟头了。”
languages.original_text: "Wyches rule the arenas — this is the way of the spires. They are lethal, brides of our dead gods. When they enter the arena, the crowd writhes with ecstasy, but this is a rare sight. Typically, their fosterlings, the Bloodstained Proselytes, oversee the butchery. These are the best killers and athletes who serve the Cult... Such arrogant upstarts. They have been undefeated for far too long."

traits.locale_text: “巫灵教派负责管理竞技场，这就是尖塔的规矩。她们是致命的监督者，是死亡众神的新娘。每当她们进入竞技场时，所有观众都会欣喜若狂，但这样的场面并不多见。通常情况下，监督屠宰的工作都是由她们的养子‘血腥叛党’来做。他们是最出色的杀手与角斗者，为巫灵教派服务……这群新人实在是太傲慢了，他们已经太久没栽过跟头了。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Hekatari herrschen über die Arenen — so ist das Leben in den Türmen. Sie sind tödlich, Bräute unserer toten Götter. Wenn sie die Arena betreten, windet sich das Publikum vor Ekstase, doch das ist ein seltener Anblick. Meist überwachen ihre Zöglinge das Gemetzel, die Blutbefleckten Proselyten. Sie sind die besten Mörder und Sportler in Diensten des Kults ... Arrogante Emporkömmlinge. Sie sind schon viel zu lange unbesiegt."
languages.original_text: "Wyches rule the arenas — this is the way of the spires. They are lethal, brides of our dead gods. When they enter the arena, the crowd writhes with ecstasy, but this is a rare sight. Typically, their fosterlings, the Bloodstained Proselytes, oversee the butchery. These are the best killers and athletes who serve the Cult... Such arrogant upstarts. They have been undefeated for far too long."

traits.locale_text: "Hekatari herrschen über die Arenen — so ist das Leben in den Türmen. Sie sind tödlich, Bräute unserer toten Götter. Wenn sie die Arena betreten, windet sich das Publikum vor Ekstase, doch das ist ein seltener Anblick. Meist überwachen ihre Zöglinge das Gemetzel, die Blutbefleckten Proselyten. Sie sind die besten Mörder und Sportler in Diensten des Kults ... Arrogante Emporkömmlinge. Sie sind schon viel zu lange unbesiegt."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: «Las brujas lideran la arena, así es como funcionan las torres. Son mortales, las novias de nuestros difuntos dioses. Cuando entran en la arena, la gente estalla en vítores, pero no es habitual. Normalmente son sus súbditos, los Prosélitos Ensangrentados, los que supervisan la matanza. Son los mejores asesinos y atletas del culto... Unos trepas engreídos. Hace tiempo que son imbatibles».
languages.original_text: "Wyches rule the arenas — this is the way of the spires. They are lethal, brides of our dead gods. When they enter the arena, the crowd writhes with ecstasy, but this is a rare sight. Typically, their fosterlings, the Bloodstained Proselytes, oversee the butchery. These are the best killers and athletes who serve the Cult... Such arrogant upstarts. They have been undefeated for far too long."

traits.locale_text: «Las brujas lideran la arena, así es como funcionan las torres. Son mortales, las novias de nuestros difuntos dioses. Cuando entran en la arena, la gente estalla en vítores, pero no es habitual. Normalmente son sus súbditos, los Prosélitos Ensangrentados, los que supervisan la matanza. Son los mejores asesinos y atletas del culto... Unos trepas engreídos. Hace tiempo que son imbatibles».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: 「ウィッチがアリーナを支配している。これが尖塔のあり方なのだ。彼らは危険な死神たちの花嫁だ。彼らがアリーナに入ると、観衆は恍惚の表情を浮かべるが、これは珍しい光景だ。普段は、彼らの養子である血まみれの改宗者が屠殺場を監督している。彼らは最高の殺人者であり、魔女団に仕えるアスリートだ…傲慢な成り上がり者なのだ。 もう長いこと無敗続きだ」
languages.original_text: "Wyches rule the arenas — this is the way of the spires. They are lethal, brides of our dead gods. When they enter the arena, the crowd writhes with ecstasy, but this is a rare sight. Typically, their fosterlings, the Bloodstained Proselytes, oversee the butchery. These are the best killers and athletes who serve the Cult... Such arrogant upstarts. They have been undefeated for far too long."

traits.locale_text: 「ウィッチがアリーナを支配している。これが尖塔のあり方なのだ。彼らは危険な死神たちの花嫁だ。彼らがアリーナに入ると、観衆は恍惚の表情を浮かべるが、これは珍しい光景だ。普段は、彼らの養子である血まみれの改宗者が屠殺場を監督している。彼らは最高の殺人者であり、魔女団に仕えるアスリートだ…傲慢な成り上がり者なのだ。 もう長いこと無敗続きだ」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Arenayı Viçler yönetir. Kulelerde düzen böyledir. Ölü tanrılarımızın ölümcül gelinleridirler. Nadiren arenaya girip seyircilere büyük heyecan yaşatırlar. Katliamı genellikle evlatlıkları Kızıl Zındıklar organize eder. Tarikat'a hizmet eden en iyi katiller ve atletler onlardır. Kendini beğenmiş, sonradan görmeler. Çok uzun süredir mağlup edilmediler."
languages.original_text: "Wyches rule the arenas — this is the way of the spires. They are lethal, brides of our dead gods. When they enter the arena, the crowd writhes with ecstasy, but this is a rare sight. Typically, their fosterlings, the Bloodstained Proselytes, oversee the butchery. These are the best killers and athletes who serve the Cult... Such arrogant upstarts. They have been undefeated for far too long."

traits.locale_text: "Arenayı Viçler yönetir. Kulelerin düzeni bu şekilde. Ölü tanrılarımızın ölümcül gelinleridirler. Arenaya girdiklerinde seyirciler heyecanla birbirini ezer ancak buna sık rastlanmaz. Katliamı genellikle evlatlıkları Kızıl Zındıklar organize eder. Tarikat'a hizmet eden en iyi katiller ve atletlerdirler. Kendini beğenmiş sonradan görmeler. Çok uzun süredir mağlup edilemediler."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
